Title: Q & A
Writer: Jonathan Nolan (created by), Dan Dietz, Dan Dietz (story editor), Lucas O'Connor (story editor)
Actors: Jim Caviezel, Kevin Chapman, Amy Acker, Michael Emerson
Plot: Reese tries to protect a software programmer with a mysterious second life, but it's unclear which side of her life the threat is coming from. Meanwhile, Claire, a young hacker that Finch protected, reaches out to him for aid.
